title: TanveerMughal
author: TanveerMughal
content: Hi, we need A Voice Over Artist for our Youtube Videos we will pay weekly 20-30$ per Weekif you are interested , or you want to add something more Contact me on telegram@tanveermughalfromytor email mq4235@gmail.com

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: TanveerMughal on April 11, 2023, 10:46:16 AMHi, we need A Voice Over Artist for our Youtube Videos we will pay weekly 20-30$ per Weekif you are interested , or you want to add something more Contact me on telegram@tanveermughalfromytor email mq4235@gmail.comAre you on earth and are you a human being? If yes, then how you can offer up to 30$ to a voice artist while a full member rank can earn more than you and while need to spend only a little time which may take to discuss your project? You are doing nothing but underestimating voice artists.

comments.author: lucifur
comments.body: I think that it would be more fair for the voice artist if you can set up a budget per video rather than a fixed payment weekly. 20-30$ is really low. You'd better just pay an AI service with thay price.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: TanveerMughal on April 11, 2023, 10:46:16 AMHi, we need A Voice Over Artist for our Youtube Videos we will pay weekly 20-30$ per Weekif you are interested , or you want to add something more Contact me on telegram@tanveermughalfromytor email mq4235@gmail.comDo you think this is a nice offer? That $30 is so small compare on the earnings you can get per video. I doubt there will be a voice actors gonna take this offer since for sure they might think about creating their own youtube videos use their talents to earn more decent income from the masterpiece they created.Don't exploit talents and take then for granted. Pay them up decent amount so it will be fair for both parties and everyone is happy to the compensation they get.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I’m certain there is somebody out there that would love to do this. Maybe someone trying to get into vocal work or perhaps a budding artist that wants a few extra bucks. For the price being offered I doubt it will take a ton of your time. People shouldn’t criticize others who are looking to employ people. I understand it may be a small amount, but in some countries an extra $30 a week would really help out.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 11, 2023, 11:17:37 AMAre you on earth and are you a human being? If yes, then how you can offer up to 30$ to a voice artist while a full member rank can earn more than you and while need to spend only a little time which may take to discuss your project? You are doing nothing but underestimating voice artists.I don't think that it makes much sense to compare his offer with how much someone can earn via signature campaign since not everyone is interested in spending several hours per day on the forum. After all, there are campaigns that pay Full Member $40 for 25 posts and I don't know about you, but for me it takes quite a lot of time to write that amount of posts. I also don't remember anyone bashing lightlord for paying peanuts in his signature campaigns. Its anyone's right to offer as much as they want, and its people's right to refuse that offer if they think that its not worth their time. By the way, you would be surprised to see how cheap voice actors can actually be. Just check Fiverr and see for yourself, there are guys that are doing it for $5 per video.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 11, 2023, 11:17:37 AMAre you on earth and are you a human being? If yes, then how you can offer up to 30$ to a voice artist while a full member rank can earn more than you and while need to spend only a little time which may take to discuss your project? You are doing nothing but underestimating voice artists.I wholeheartedly agree with OgNasty and Rikafip on this matter. Comparing the earnings from a signature campaign with the offer that the OP has made is completely unfair. It takes a lot of effort to reach a certain rank in this forum, after that someone will be eligible to join those signature campaigns. The majority of signature campaigns only accept ranks that are above the member level, and some only accept senior member and above ranks. Another fact is that writing of those posts isn't an easy task, only those posters will receive good earnings whose posts are of really good quality and those posts require a lot of time, knowledge, and consistency, to produce. In third world countries there are thousands of voice artists who would be willing to do the job for way less than 20 dollars. For many of those artists an extra 20-30 dollars would be more than sufficient. It's sad but truth that many of these artists are unable to find any such jobs and freelancing sites are extremely competitive these days. I believe that the OP will easily find someone who will do the job for him.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: Globally wages vary alot, that might be part of the reason why.   But you could also argue success would bring more wages surely, I think thats the largest part of why; it would certainly seem very unfair if greater wages later were not a possibility etc.Years ago I got offered some work for quite a small amount but because of how BTC has grown, if I had taken that job I could buy a house with it now. Obviously I wish I persevered with the work, put time aside etc.   depends how much time people have spare for some its valid experience to take a job at least to begin with.

comments.author: TanveerMughal
comments.body: Sorry for the late response everyone, I found a voice over artist already, I do admit I made a mistake, I only needed 9-10 minutes of voice overs per week.
